title: What to think
content: [{"children":[{"text":"The advancement of society fundamentally relies on the advancement of science and technology.","color":"rgb(17, 17, 17)"}],"id":"cd3cbe00-02e8-40ad-85e7-8996b5e856d5","type":"p","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc"},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"All organizations are essentially machines prone to losing control, with parts that are very fragile and prone to breaking.","color":"rgb(17, 17, 17)"}],"id":"ffea22ab-e41d-4d78-a55c-ffe87524a563","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":2},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Trust between people is not so easily achieved.","color":"rgb(17, 17, 17)"}],"id":"086bf1df-35cb-4b3a-85bd-c32d2e85ce7e","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":3},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"As people age, their imagination tends to diminish and they become increasingly stubborn, cautiously living within the confines of their own experiences and lessons learned.","color":"rgb(17, 17, 17)"}],"id":"7106d54b-c1b7-49c8-a0c0-ccd6670c3a03","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":4},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":""}],"id":"81369688-ff99-44de-a50d-c112951d2f4d"}]
